page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: Christopher. My day begins with feeding the chickens and then I have my breakfast. After breakfast I feed the pigs and they eat crushed barley , and then I take the dog for a walk down the lane. Next I pick up the eggs and take them home. I have a wash and Mum takes my brother and me to school by car. After school I arrive home at 3.50 and watch television until 4.30. Then I feed the pigs and they eat lettuces, potato peelings, tea-bags, egg shells and rotten tomatoes.After feeding the pigs I watch television again. I like the cartoons best of all. After tea I feed the chickens and pick up the rest of the eggs. I ride my bike and the dog follows me. If there's time I help Dad with the welding in his workshop.
